name: PathFinder 3D Lite
description:
★★★★★ Take a look to our new game SiliBili (3D Action - Adventure Game) ★★★★★

PathFinder 3D is a creative puzzle game with unique gameplay that combines puzzle, math and action! Your mission is to find the shortest path and guide "BeeVee" to collect all the pollens from flowers and avoid all kind of bugs on the way. 55 levels of fun and challenge in combination with beautiful 3D environments and HD graphics.

How to play

Drag the white and blue dots to create the flight trajectory for "BeeVee" in order to collect all the pollens on the way. Each level has at least two correct paths, find the shortest one and get all 3 stars.

Full Version Features
- 55 Levels of challenge: Each level adds more dots, barriers and pollens
- Fun: Train your brain, let you experience infinite charm!
- Gameplay: Unique gameplay that allows you create your own path
- 3D Art: HD graphics and pretty 3D environment with funny characters
